text: allah ku sati (bhagasvamulu) kalpincevaru antaru: "Okavela allah korite memu gani, ma tandritatalu gani ayanaku sati kappince varamu kamu mariyu denini nisedhinci undevaramu kamu." Variki purvam varu kuda ma siksanu ruci cudananta varaku ide vidhanga tiraskarincaru. Varini adugu: "Mi vadda edaina (rudhi ayina) jnanam unda! Unte ma mundu pettandi. Miru kevalam kalpanalanu anusaristunnaru mariyu miru kevalam uhaganale cestunnaru
